subdisciplines.name: Musical Acoustics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the physical properties of sound in music, including harmonics, overtones, frequency spectra, and timbre.

subdisciplines.name: Music Cognition
subdisciplines.description: The study of how humans perceive, process, and respond to music, including topics like memory, emotion, and attention.

subdisciplines.name: Music Therapy
subdisciplines.description: The use of music as a therapeutic tool to achieve physical, emotional, and cognitive goals in individuals.
